      • getTolerance

        public double getTolerance()
        Description copied from interface: Intersection
        Gets the margin of error for the distance computed by the ray intersection computation. The actual ray intersection is guaranteed to be within the interval (getDistance() - getTolerance(), getDistance() + getTolerance().
        Specified by:
        getTolerance in interface Intersection
        Returns:
        The margin of error for the distance computed by the ray intersection computation.
